LanguageData.Leather_WoWBloodElf.label: 血精灵皮
LanguageData.Leather_WoWBloodElf.description: Tanned, dried, scraped Blood Elf skin. Most people find this material horrifying. Some find it fascinating. While a decent leather, it neither protects nor insulates particularly well.
LanguageData.Leather_WoWDraenei.label: draenei leather
LanguageData.Leather_WoWDraenei.description: Tanned, dried, scraped Blood Elf skin. Most people find this material horrifying. Some find it fascinating. While a decent leather, it neither protects nor insulates particularly well.
LanguageData.Leather_WoWDwarf.label: dwarf leather
LanguageData.Leather_WoWDwarf.description: Tanned, dried, scraped dwarf skin. Most people find this material horrifying. Some find it fascinating. While a decent leather, it neither protects nor insulates particularly well.
LanguageData.Leather_WoWForsaken.label: 被遗忘者皮
LanguageData.Leather_WoWForsaken.description: Rotting, dried, scraped, Forsaken skin. Most people find this material utterly disgusting and horrifying. This leather being rotted, neither protects nor insulates particularly well. Smells pretty bad too.
LanguageData.Leather_WoWGnome.label: gnome leather
LanguageData.Leather_WoWGnome.description: Tanned, dried, scraped Gnome skin. Most people find this material horrifying. Some find it fascinating. While a decent leather, it neither protects nor insulates particularly well.
LanguageData.Leather_WoWGoblin.label: goblin leather
LanguageData.Leather_WoWGoblin.description: Tanned, dried, scraped Goblin skin. Most people find this material horrifying. Some find it fascinating. While a decent leather, it neither protects nor insulates particularly well.
LanguageData.Leather_WoWHighElf.label: 高等精灵皮
LanguageData.Leather_WoWHighElf.description: Tanned, dried, scraped High Elf skin. Most people find this material horrifying. Some find it fascinating. While a decent leather, it neither protects nor insulates particularly well.
LanguageData.Leather_WoWNightElf.label: 暗夜精灵皮
LanguageData.Leather_WoWNightElf.description: Tanned, dried, scraped Night Elf skin. Most people find this material horrifying. Some find it fascinating. While a decent leather, it neither protects nor insulates particularly well.
LanguageData.Leather_WoWOrc.label: 兽人皮
LanguageData.Leather_WoWOrc.description: Tanned, dried, scraped Tau skin. Most people find this material horrifying. Some find it fascinating. While a decent leather, it neither protects nor insulates particularly well.
LanguageData.Leather_WoWTauren.label: tauren leather
LanguageData.Leather_WoWTauren.description: The furry pelt of a tauren. Most people find this material horrifying. Some find it fascinating. Good at temperature regulation in cold climates.
LanguageData.Leather_WoWTroll.label: 巨魔皮
LanguageData.Leather_WoWTroll.description: Tanned, dried, scraped Tau skin. Most people find this material horrifying. Some find it fascinating. While a decent leather, it neither protects nor insulates particularly well.

LanguageData.Leather_WoWWorgen.description: Tanned, dried, scraped Tau skin. Most people find this material horrifying. Some find it fascinating. While a decent leather, it neither protects nor insulates particularly well.
